lines.text: Seriously, man. It's not that hard.
What isn't? You really think this all ties together?
Yeah, man! Like, the blood was easy. And there was a spell that handled the fake hole.
And there's one more spell we've already looked at before- one that fits this gap perfectly.
That <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> spell prevents <c=#FF00FF>all</c> movement- including heartbeats!
The target's in a kind of stasis, like this. He can look super dead, without actually being dead!
Not that your whole theory isn't entirely bonkers, but you've got one.
Bonkers? Pay attention, Leo! It fits the evidence!
Well, I'll be darned. You're not wrong.
And you know what? We can verify this one.
Let's just wrap up the rest of this, and then we'll see about closin' the case.
